description: Ms. composite codex. Title from text 2. Leaves 258-263 detached.
abstract: Collection of Arabic and Persian texts on a variety of topics.
extent: 263 leaves : paper ; 182 x 130 (110-150 x 66-86) mm bound to 185 x 133 mm
title: [al-Zubur va al-bayyināt] ... [etc.].
subject: Qurʼan. Sūrat al-Fātiḥah—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
binding note: Full maroon leather with flap on front cover; blind-stamped fillets; yellow paper doublures; back cover missing.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
